name: Pasta with Arugula and Tomatoes
author: ChristyM
summary: This is a super-simple, quick pasta recipe that tastes best with cherry tomatoes or other sun-ripened tomatoes. It is perfect during the summer months when tomatoes are in season.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons shaved Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat and cook garlic until translucent and fragrant, about 2 minutes
Increase heat, cook, and stir until lightly browned, 5 to 7 minutes
Remove skillet from heat and mix in arugula
Mix in cooked spaghetti and drizzle with olive oil
